sentence: ), who is facing a GOP primary challenge in her district from lawyer Harriet Hageman, announced Monday that she raised nearly $3 million in the first quarter of the year and has $6.8 million on hand.
title: Post Politics Now Biden wades back into politically fraught politics of gun control
